question: Nasa and ________ have signed an agreement to explore putting flying taxis in the skies over US cities.
explanation: Nasa and Uber have signed an agreement to explore putting flying taxis in the skies over US cities. Nasa will begin simulations for so-called "urban air mobility'' vehicles that also include delivery drones. Nasa says the goal is to create a rideshare network that will allow residents to hail a small aircraft the same way Uber users can now use an app to call a car.
